thread.title: Viewsroom: Jamie Dimon risks ruining a good run

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Viewsroom: Jamie Dimon risks ruining a good run
text:
NEW YORK (Reuters Breakingviews) - JPMorganâ€™s chairman and CEO intends to lead the bank until around 2023. Dimon has built a strong and successful company over the past 12 years. But the longer he stays, the harder it becomes to leave on an unambiguous high. Plus: Asian governments tackle bitcoin.
